00152 /*
00153      Just a few comments.
00154      1)  The single_na30 testcase has the new Allele Peaks functionality invoked and has as inputs the appropriatly updated snp-reference file.
00155          It uses as input a CN reference that was generated using the na30 annotations file. The testcase itself runs on the na30.1
00156          annotations file.  This tests the CN flag functionality. At present the snp-reference file does not have a section that forces
00157          the use of the new LOH algorithm.
00158      2)  The single_newLOH testcase tests the new LOH algorithms. The snp-reference does have a section for the new AP algorithm.  No specific
00159          testing of CN flags was attempted for this testcase.
00160      3)  The single testcase is the original testcase using the na28 annotations file.  It has input of an updated AP section since the
00161          AP algorithm does not have a fall back to the old style if the appropriate section does not exist in the snp-reference.  The
00162          idea is to keep this testcase around to validate backwards compatibility.
00163      4)  The batch testcase creates and uses CN/SNP reference files.  It uses na28.  Keep it around to validate backwards compatibility.
00164          The idea being that the changes to the CN flags functionality to accomodate different annotation files in the create/use
00165          portions should not mess up the situation where the annotations files are the same for the two operations. I did have to
00166          update some of the golden cychp files, since the original algorithm wrote values for all ProbeSets in the Probeset section
00167          even those with processFlag=0.  This was not a problem in the original code since these were completely filtered out befor
00168          any analysis began.
00169      5)  The batch_newLOH testcase tests the create/use functionality when the new LOH algorithm is invoked.  Tests that the snp-reference
00170          file that is created gets all the new LOH information needed.
00171 */
00172 
00173 void run()
00174 {
00175 
00176         single_na30();
00177         batch_newLOH();
00178 #if( defined(_WIN64))
00179         CytoScanBatch();
00180         CytoScanUse();
00181         CytoScanCreate();
00182 #endif
00183 
00184 
00185 
00186 #if ( (!defined(__MACH__)) && (defined(__LP64__)) )
00187         CytoScanBatch();
00188         CytoScanUse();
00189         CytoScanCreate();
00190         twoSevenMCreate();
00191         twoSevenCancerNA31();
00192         twoSevenCancer();
00193         batch_snp6_dual();
00194         batch_snp6();
00195         batch_snp6_dual_noAdapter();
00196         batch_snp6_noAdapter();
00197 #endif
00198         single_newLOH();
00199         batch();
00200         single();
00201 
00202 #if ( (!defined(_WIN32)) || (defined(_WIN64)))
00203         CytoScanBadAnno();
00204 #else
00205         Verbose::out(1,"APT-994: test-regression-copynumber-cyto: CytoScanBadAnno commented out for Windows 32 bit");
00206 #endif
00207             
00208 }
00209       // This test is identical to the batch testcase except for the input snp reference file. The new snp reference has sections which cause the
00210       // invocation of new loh algorithms. In the creation step, no differences should be found between the CN reference file generated in
00211       // the batch ran and the present test case. Thus in the comparison below the CN reference file's generated in batch and batch_newLOH are
00212       // compared to the same gold CN reference file. The snp reference will be different in this run than in the original batch run. So the
00213       // the batch and batch_newLOH have separate gold snp reference files.
00214       // In the use step for the new_LOH run, since the loh algorithm has different inputs (from the new snp-reference file), the cychp files
00215       // generated in batch and batch_newLOH will be different. Thus batch and batch_newLOH have separate gold cychp files to compare to
00216       // during the use portion of their runs.
00217 
00218 
00219 void batch_newLOH()
00220 {
00221       Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_newLOH part 1.");
00222       std::string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_newLOH");
00223       Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
00224       Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
00225       vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00226       string command1 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
00227                     -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00228                     --force true \
00229                     --check-input-files true \
00230                     --text-output true \
00231                     --cnchp-output false \
00232                     --cychp-output true \
00233                     --set-analysis-name ca \
00234                     --meta-data-info wittgenstein=bushido \
00235                     --meta-data-info batchMode=Creation \
00236                     --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL \
00237                     --snp-reference-input-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.batch_newLOH.snpref.a5 \
00238                     --snp-reference-output-file " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5 \
00239                     --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.CDF \
00240                     --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes \
00241                     --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes \
00242                     --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db \
00243                     --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab \
00244                     --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt \
00245                     --gender-override-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-LOHReference-Full-Genders.txt \
00246                     --genotype-call-override-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMapCalls_LOHReferenceSet-FullArray.txt \
00247                     --cel-files ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/CELFileList_5F5M.txt \
00248                     --out-dir " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH \
00249                     --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3 \
00250                     --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0 \
00251                     --xx-cutoff=0.8 \
00252                     --xx-cutoff-high=1.07 \
00253                     --y-cutoff=0.65 \
00254                     --keep-intermediate-data false \
00255                     --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5 \
00256                     --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
00257                     --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6 \
00258                     --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
00259                     --analysis cn-segment \
00260                     --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0 \
00261                     --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251 \
00262                     --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05 \
00263                     --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method \
00264                     --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
00265                     --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0 \
00266                     --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001 \
00267                     --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 \
00268             ";
00269 
00270         std::set<std::string> setLocalIgnore;
00271         std::string strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5";
00272         std::string strFileName2 = m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5";
00273 
00274         // See comments at the beginning of this testcase as to why we compare against the gold batch CN reference file. (And why there is no
00275         // separate gold batch_newLOH CN reference file.)
00276 
00277 
00278         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "EMSNParameters", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00279         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "EMSNArray", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00280         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "SNPReference", setLocalIgnore, 0.0003, 1.0));
00281 
00282         strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL";
00283         strFileName2 = m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL";
00284 
00285         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "AntigenomicProbes", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00286         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "MedianSignals", setLocalIgnore, 0.5, 0.999999));
00287         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "ProbeEffects", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 0.999999));
00288         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SNPPosteriors", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00289         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SketchCN", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00290         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SketchSNP", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00291         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "WaveCorrection", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 0.99999));
00292 
00293 
00294 
00295         RegressionTest test("batch_newLOH part 1", command1.c_str(), checks);
00296         test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00297 
00298         bool bPassed = test.pass();
00299         if(!bPassed) {
00300             Verbose::out(1, "Error in: batch_newLOH part1. " + test.getErrorMsg());
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00304             Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_newLOH part1. " + test.getErrorMsg());    
00305         }
00306         {
00307             m_numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
00308             m_numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
00309         }
00310 
00311         if (bPassed)
00312         {
00313             Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_newLOH part 2."); 
00314             string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir , "batch_newLOH");
00315 
00316             std::string  goldDirectory="../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch_newLOH";
00317             std::string  newDirectory= Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_newLOH");
00318             string infix = "ca";
00319 
00320             std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
00321 
00322             std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
00323 
00324 
00325 #ifndef __LP64__
00326             {
00327                 std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00328                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00329                 std::string ignoreString2 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00330                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00331             }
00332 #endif
00333 #ifdef __APPLE__
00334             {
00335                 std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00336                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00337                 std::string ignoreString2 = "Chromosomes.Summary";
00338                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00339                 std::string ignoreString3 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00340                 setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString3);
00341             }
00342 #endif
00343 
00344             std::string ignoreString = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00345             setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00346 
00347 
00348             vector<RegressionCheck *> checks2;
00349             checks2.push_back(new CychpCheck(
00350                                                 m_vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles,
00351                                                 goldDirectory,
00352                                                 newDirectory,
00353                                                 infix,
00354                                                 setIgnore,
00355                                                 setSetIgnore,
00356                                                 mapEpsilon,
00357                                                 0.0001,
00358                                                 0.9999989,
00359                                                 false));
00360 
00361 
00362 
00363             string command2 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
00364                         -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00365                         --force true \
00366                         --text-output true \
00367                         --cnchp-output false \
00368                         --cychp-output true \
00369                         --set-analysis-name ca \
00370                         --meta-data-info wittgenstein=bushido \
00371                         --meta-data-info batchMode=Use \
00372                         --reference-input " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL \
00373                         --snp-reference-input-file " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5 \
00374                         --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.CDF \
00375                         --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes \
00376                         --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes \
00377                         --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db \
00378                         --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab \
00379                         --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt \
00380                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18547_A08_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00381                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18603_B03_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00382                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18943_C11_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00383                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00384                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-Cs_NA10857_A10_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00385                         --cels ../../../regression-data/data/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-Cs_NA12003_D04_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00386                         --out-dir " + m_testDir + "/batch_newLOH \
00387                         --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3 \
00388                         --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0 \
00389                         --xx-cutoff=0.8 \
00390                         --xx-cutoff-high=1.07 \
00391                         --y-cutoff=0.65 \
00392                         --keep-intermediate-data false \
00393                         --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5 \
00394                         --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
00395                         --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6 \
00396                         --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
00397                         --analysis cn-segment \
00398                         --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0 \
00399                         --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251 \
00400                         --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05 \
00401                         --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method \
00402                         --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
00403                         --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0 \
00404                         --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001 \
00405                         --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 \
00406                 ";
00407 
00408 
00409 
00410             RegressionTest test2("batch_newLOH part 2", command2.c_str(), checks2, false);
00411             test2.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00412             if(!test2.pass()) {
00413                 Verbose::out(1, "Error in: batch_newLOH part 2. " + test2.getErrorMsg());
00414             }
00415             else
00416             {
00417                 Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_newLOH part 2. " + test.getErrorMsg());   
00418             }
00419             {
00420                 m_numPassed += test2.getNumPassed();
00421                 m_numFailed += test2.getNumFailed();
00422             }
00423 
00424         }

00771 void batch()
00772 {
00773         Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch part 1.");
00774         string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch");
00775         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
00776         Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
00777         vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00778 
00779 
00780         string command = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
00781                     -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00782                     --force true \
00783                     --check-input-files true \
00784                     --text-output true \
00785                     --cnchp-output false \
00786                     --cychp-output true \
00787                     --set-analysis-name ca \
00788                     --keep-intermediate-data true \
00789                     --meta-data-info wittgenstein=bushido \
00790                     --meta-data-info batchMode=Creation \
00791                     --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL \
00792                     --snp-reference-input-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5 \
00793                     --snp-reference-output-file " + m_testDir + "/batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5 \
00794                     --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.CDF \
00795                     --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes \
00796                     --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes \
00797                     --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db \
00798                     --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab \
00799                     --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt \

01350                         --verbose 4 --cyto2 false \

01372                         --xx-cutoff 0.61 \

01560                                                 setSetIgnore,
01561                                                 mapEpsilon,
01562                                                 0.0001,
01563                                                 0.9999989,
01564                                                 false));       
01565 
01566         string command1 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
01567             --text-output true \
01568             --doDualNormalization true \
01569             --keep-intermediate-data false \
01570             --run-geno-qc true \
01571             --qca-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/Version.mar21.11/CytoScanHD_Array.r1.qca \
01572             --qcc-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/Version.mar21.11/CytoScanHD_Array.r1.qcc \
01573             --snp-qc-use-contrast true \
01574             --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/lib/CytoScan/Version.mar21.11/CytoScanHD_Array.snplist.txt \
01575             --force true \
01576             --adapter-type-normalization false \
01577             --cnchp-output false \
01578             --cychp-output true \

01585             --out-dir " + outdir1 + " \

01587             --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.9 \
01588             --xx-cutoff 0.61 \
01589             --xx-cutoff-high 0.95 \
01590             --y-cutoff 0.58 \
01591             --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01592             --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01593             --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=6.wave-smooth=true \
01594             --analysis genotype \
01595             --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5 \
01596             --analysis allelic-difference-CytoScan.outlier-trim=3.0.step=20.window=100.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.25.cutoff=0.05.clean-threshold=0.35.symmetry=true \
01597             --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
01598             --analysis cn-cyto2.hmmCN_state=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4\"\'\".hmmCN_mu=\"\'\"-2,-0.45,0,0.3,0.51\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma=\"\'\"0.35,0.35,0.25,0.25,0.25\"\'\".hmmCN_state-X=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4\"\'\".hmmCN_mu-X=\"\'\"-2,-0.47,0,0.33,0.53\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma-X=\"\'\"0.35,0.35,0.25,0.25,0.25\"\'\".hmmCN_state-Y=\"\'\"0,1,2,3,4\"\'\".hmmCN_mu-Y=\"\'\"-2,-0.45,0,0.3,0.51\"\'\".hmmCN_sigma-Y=\"\'\"0.35,0.35,0.25,0.25,0.25\"\'\".diagonal-weight-Y=0.995.mapd-weight-Y=0.min-segment-size-Y=5.hmm-confidence-weight-Y=0.6.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6.diagonal-weight-X=0.995.mapd-weight-X=0.min-segment-size-X=5.hmm-confidence-weight-X=0.6 \
01599              --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
01600              --analysis cn-segment \
01601              --analysis lohCytoScan.lohCS_errorrate=0.05.lohCS_beta=0.001.lohCS_alpha=0.01.lohCS_separation=1000000.lohCS_nMinMarkers=10.lohCS_NoCallThreshold=0.05.lohCS_minGenomicSpan=1000000 \
01602             --analysis loh-segment \
01603             --analysis cn-neutral-loh \

01607         ";

01715 void batch_snp6_noAdapter()
01716 {

01718         string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "batch_snp6_noAdapter");
01719         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
01720         Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
01721         vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
01722 
01723         string command = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
01724         --verbose 1 \
01725         --cyto2 false \
01726         --doDualNormalization false \
01727         --keep-intermediate-data false \
01728         --force true \
01729         --adapter-type-normalization false \
01730         --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false \
01731         --analysis gaussian-smooth \
01732         --analysis allelic-difference \
01733         --analysis cn-state \
01734         --analysis cn-segment \
01735         --analysis lohCytoScan \
01736         --analysis loh-segment  \
01737         --analysis cn-neutral-loh \
01738         --analysis normal-diploid \
01739          --run-geno-qc true \
01740          --cychp-output true \
01741          --cnchp-output false \
01742          --text-output true \
01743          --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/batch_snp6_noAdapter/CNReference.cyto.snp6.a5.ref \
01744          --set-analysis-name CN5 \
01745          --out-dir " + outdir + " \
01746          --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf \
01747          --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
01748          --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
01749          --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.2.annot.db \
01750          --qca-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.qca \
01751          --qcc-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.qcc \
01752          --male-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.71 \
01753          --female-gender-ratio-cutoff 0.48 \
01754          --xx-cutoff 0.8 \
01755          --xx-cutoff-high 1.07 \
01756          --y-cutoff 0.65 \
01757          --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method none \
01758          --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01759          --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method none \
01760          --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=7 \
01761          --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.wave-count=7.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
01762          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA12004_GW6_C.CEL \
01763          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA12003_GW6_C.CEL \
01764          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA11993_GW6_C.CEL \

01766          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA11881_GW6_C.CEL \
01767          ../../../regression-data/data/cel/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA10863_GW6_C.CEL \
01768          ";
01769 
01770         std::string strFileName1 = m_testDir + "/batch_snp6_noAdapter/CNReference.cyto.snp6.a5.ref";
01771         std::string strFileName2 = "../../../regression-data/data/copynumber/copynumber-cyto/batch_snp6_noAdapter/CNReference.cyto.snp6.a5.ref";
01772         std::set<std::string> setLocalIgnore;
01773 
01774         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CN5", "AntigenomicProbes", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01775         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CN5", "CN5.plier.feature-response", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01776         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CN5", "CN5.snp-posteriors", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01777         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CN5", "target-sketch", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01778         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CopyNumber", "Reference", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01779         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "CopyNumber", "WaveCorrection", setLocalIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
01780 
01781         RegressionTest test("batch_snp6_noAdapter part 1", command.c_str(), checks);
01782         test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
01783 
01784         bool bPassed = false;
01785         bPassed = test.pass();
01786         if(!bPassed) {
01787             Verbose::out(1, "Error in:  batch_snp6_noAdapter part 1" + test.getErrorMsg());
01788         }
01789         else
01790         {
01791             Verbose::out(1, "Passed: batch_snp6_noAdapter part 1 " + test.getErrorMsg());            
01792         }
01793 
01794         {
01795             m_numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
01796             m_numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
01797 
01798         }
01799         if (bPassed)
01800         {
01801             Verbose::out(1, "Working on batch_snp6_noAdapter part 2.");
01802             string outdir2 = Fs::join(m_testDir , "/batch_snp6_noAdapter");
01803

01805

01808             string infix = "CN5";
01809

01811

01813 
01814             checks2.push_back(new CychpCheck(
01815                                                 m_vCytogenetics_SNP6_SixFiles,
01816                                                 goldDirectory,
01817                                                 newDirectory,
01818                                                 infix,
01819                                                 setIgnore,
01820                                                 setSetIgnore,
01821                                                 mapEpsilon,
01822                                                 0.0001,
01823                                                 0.9999989,
01824                                                 false));
01825 
01826 
01827             string command2 = "./apt-copynumber-cyto \
01828             -verbose 1 \
01829             --cyto2 false \
01830             --force true \
01831             --adapter-type-normalization false \

01835             --analysis log2-ratio.gc-correction=false \
01836             --analysis gaussian-smooth \
01837             --analysis allelic-difference \
01838             --analysis cn-state \

01850             --out-dir " + outdir2 + " \
01851             --cdf-file ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf \
01852             --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \

02517 
02518 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
02519     try {
02520 
02521         FsTestDir testDir;
02522         // Full regression takes 26GB.
02523         int64_t byteSize = (30.0 * 1073741824);
02524         testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-cyto", true, byteSize ); 
02525         ofstream logOut;
02526         string logName;
02527         logName = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "test-regression-copynumber-cyto.log");
02528         Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
02529         Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
02530         LogStream log(3, &logOut);
02531 
02532         Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
02533         Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
02534         Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
02535 
02536         Verbose::setLevel(3);
02537         test_regression_copynumber_cyto test;
02538         test.m_testDir = testDir.asString();
02539         test.parseArgv(argv);
02540         test.doValgrind();
02541         string database = test.getDatabase();
02542 
02543         Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-copynumber-cyto");
02544 
02545         test.run();
02546 
02547         Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.getNumPassed()) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.getNumFailed()) + " for test-regression-copynumber-cyto");
02548         logOut.close();
02549         return test.getNumFailed() != 0;
02550     }
02551     catch(...) {
02552         Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
02553         return 1;
02554     }
02555     return 1;
02556 }
